textAfterTable: Express Shipping Service Delivery Time Single Item Each Additional Item Australia, NZ & Asia 1-5 Days $28.00 $13.00 USA, Canada & Sth America 1-5 Days $28.00 $13.00 Europe, Africa & Middle East 1-5 Days $28.00 $13.00 Combined Shipping Information If you purchase multiple items or win multiple auctions within a 7 day period you will qualify for combined shipping; In order to qualify for a combined shipping discount, you must pay for all qualifying items at the same time; We cannot combine items on to a single invoice if items are purchased from listings with different currencies (eBay.com, eBay.co.uk, eBay.com.au) however we discount the postage charges appropriately to reflect combined postage; Shipping Policy All items will be shipped directly from Sth East Asia which is where we manufacture (China, Thailand & Vietnam); Our Standard Shipping Service is not an insured service & is not a live traceable service; EMS Express is a fully insured & traceable service; All postage services provided by Global Clothing Group are registered services and require a receivers signature; Please keep in mind that we are providing international postage and from time to time a short postal delay can be experienced.
